thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Monday, 12 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Veeco Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.53

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Veeco Q4 Non-GAAP Earnings Per Share $0.53
text:
Feb 12 (Reuters) - Veeco Instruments Inc:
* VEECO REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FISCAL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.53
* Q4 GAAP LOSS PER SHARE $0.12 * Q4 ‍REVENUES OF $143.4 MILLION, COMPARED WITH $93.6 MILLION IN SAME PERIOD LAST YEAR​
* REVENUE IS EXPECTED IN RANGE OF $140 MILLION TO $165 MILLION FOR Q1 2018​
* ‍GAAP EARNINGS (LOSS) PER SHARE ARE EXPECTED IN RANGE OF ($0.50) TO ($0.32) FOR Q1 2018​
* ‍NON-GAAP EARNINGS (LOSS) PER SHARE ARE EXPECTED IN RANGE OF ($0.04) TO $0.14 FOR Q1 2018​
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.09, REVENUE VIEW $143.9 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
